alert.note: Alert for Northwest Deserts, Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 07 at 10:20AM MST until July 07 at 8:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR MOHAVE COUNTY... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY... * TIMING...Until 8 pm MST this evening. * WIND...South to southwest wind 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * HUMIDITY...Minimum humidity values 5 to 10 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will have the potential to spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is highly discouraged. Area fuels are near or at critical dryness levels further contributing to the high risk of fire danger.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
